items.title: Denmark says it will withdraw the EU "Chat Control" proposal, which would force tech companies to scan messages for CSAM, and instead support voluntary scanning (Claudie Moreau/Euractiv)
items.summary:
Claudie Moreau / Euractiv:
Denmark says it will withdraw the EU “Chat Control” proposal, which would force tech companies to scan messages for CSAM, and instead support voluntary scanning  —  The Danes will seek to propose a voluntary detection regime in the CSAM proposal, instead of controversial mandatory detection orders

items.title: As Iraqi politicians gear up for election, public disillusion sets in again
items.summary: BAGHDAD (Reuters) -Iraqis are bracing for yet another election they fear will change little, with many seeing the pro-reform campaign banners for the November 11 vote as empty gestures from elites who have delivered little since the 2003 U.S.-led invasion. Read full story

items.title: This Best Buy early Black Friday deal takes a whopping $950 off Samsung’s 49-inch Odyssey OLED 240Hz gaming monitor
items.summary:
Best Buy’s 2025 Black Friday Doorbuster deals are now live, and one of the standout offers drops Samsung’s 49-inch 240Hz Odyssey OLED G9 (G950) gaming monitor to $849.99 shipped. This curved display normally retails for $1,800 and is currently listed for $1,050 directly at Samsung. This model has previously only dipped as low as $1,050 before being replaced by the newer 2025 Odyssey OLED G95SD display, and today’s offer at Best Buy takes $950 off its usual going rate to land it $200 below that price. This is the lowest we have seen this model fetch yet, making this a solid Doorbuster offer that’s hard to beat. This is a great time to cash in and snag it if you have always wanted to buy one of these for your battlestation, and you can learn more about it below.

more…

items.title: Anker’s eufy S350 indoor security cam with a 360-degree view and AI tracking drops back to $100 (Reg. $140)
items.summary:
Through its official eufy Amazon storefront, Anker is offering its S350 Security Indoor Cam back down at $99.99 shipped. Normally going for $140 at full price, this is the most repeated deal we’ve seen on this camera over 2025, often coming in once a month. While we have seen it go as low as $80 in the past (once during the most recent Prime Day event), if you missed out three weeks ago, you’re getting the next-best price since mid-July that we have tracked. You’ll be upgrading your interior security with a 29% markdown that cuts $40 off the going rate, landing it at the fourth-lowest overall price.

items.summary:
Amazon is offering up to 20% discounts on LEGO Marvel building sets, like the Spider-Man vs. Doc Ock Subway Train Scene down at $43.99 shipped. Normally fetching $55 at full price, this set has previously seen two discounts to $48, and more recently $45, before it fell lower to this rate. You can pick it up for your LEGO super hero collection with a total $11 markdown that lands it at a new all-time low price. Head below to check out the collection of LEGO Marvel sets that are seeing discounts right now, several of which are down at rates we’ve been tracking for weeks to months, but are still undercutting the price you’d pay directly from LEGO.
